Bibliographic References: LCS, p. 214, no. 75, pi. 84,3^; Suppl. Ill, p. 107, no. 114; Kanowski, The Antiquities Collection, pp. 8Non Sepcified9 (ill.); Trendall, Twenty Tears of Progress, pi. 7, fig. 13
Imagery Description: (a) Young satyr with drinkingNon Sepcifiedhorn, seated woman holding up branch in her right hand and turning her head to right to look at a bearded silen, who holds a mirror, (b) two draped women, left wearing chiton, right himation over chiton
